attributes.action: standardise the charge for Domestic Energy Assessment (DEA) to reflect the level of effort and details’ accuracy required.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The predicted charge for producing an energy certificate for a typical property is far too low and does not reflect the responsibility, effort and accuracy of information collected. It will be determined by larger HIP providers or Panel Management firms to maximise their profit at the expense of the individual Assessors. The government should assume the responsibility to regulate this and reflect its importance to the environment as well as preserve the social and economic balance of those who are involved.
